Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Stony Island
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
